title: Ptolemy's Gate
description: Three years have passed since Nathaniel, the magician, helped prevent an attack on London. Now an established member of the British Government, he faces problems. The long-suffering djinni is growing weak, his patience is nearing its end, and he is treating Bartimaeus worse than ever. In this final edition of the trilogy, we listen as the threesome must face treacherous magicians, unravel a complex conspiracy, and defeat a faction of demons.
author: Jonathan Stroud
